1. Melania Trump issues ’AI challenge’ to America's youth.  Deseret News
  2. First lady Melania Trump invites students to join nationwide AI challenge contest  ABC News
  3. US parents and teachers: share your experiences of AI in schools  The Guardian
  4. Press Release: Byron Donalds Announces Deadline for Presidential AI Challenge Project Submissions on January 20th  Quiver Quantitative
  5. Upheaval at the CDC, the White House launches AI Challenge for students, and Tempus AI acquired Paige  VatorNews

item.title: Microsoft Launches Public Testing of First In-House Foundation Model - PYMNTS.com
item.description:

  4. Microsoft Unveils AI Models to Lessen Its Reliance on OpenAI’s  The Information
  5. With new in-house models, Microsoft lays the groundwork for independence from OpenAI  Ars Technica
